job_tasks.phrase: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering activities of designing, architecting, and developing a software system (compiler and SDK).

job_tasks.phrase: Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and implementing specific optimizations within a software system (compiler), which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the execution and technical guidance of projects related to a software system (compiler) and its support for various workloads, fitting into software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with other teams on technical strategy and optimizing a software stack, which are core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.
job_tasks.justification: Overseeing a pipeline and proposing changes for performance and accuracy relates to the operational aspects and maintenance of a software system, akin to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring best practices for testing methodologies within a software development context falls under the operational and quality assurance aspects of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects.
job_tasks.justification: Driving technical direction and setting priorities for projects indicates an understanding of business impact and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform.
job_tasks.justification: Shaping systems and advancing a platform with a focus on scalability and flexibility implies a strategic understanding of the business's AI platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with cross-functional teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and guiding engineers, and being a partner to manager and peers are clear indicators of communication and collaboration skills.
Directly states the requirement for solving complex, open-ended problems.
Driving technical direction implies taking ownership and initiative.

job_tasks.justification: Setting priorities for projects demonstrates ownership and initiative.

job_tasks.justification: Modeling leadership and guiding others indicates ownership and initiative in team development.

profile.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes core software engineering tasks related to compiler development, architecture, and optimization (Macro-Category A). While it mentions supporting generative AI workloads and advancing an AI platform, the primary focus is on the engineering of the compiler infrastructure itself, rather than the development or fine-tuning of AI models or prompt engineering (Macro-Category B). The tasks are about building the tools that *enable* AI, not the AI models themselves. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is very clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities, focusing on compiler engineering and its integration within an AI platform. The distinction between building the AI infrastructure and building the AI models themselves is well-defined, allowing for a confident profile assignment.
